Class CollisionComponent

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.components.CollisionComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Hitbox
public class CollisionComponent extends Object implements Hitbox
Represents the collision component for an Actor, handling hitbox size, position, and collision checks. It can also visualize the hitbox for debugging purposes if the corresponding setting is enabled.

  • Field Summary

    Field

    The X offset of the hitbox relative to the owner's position.
    double
    offsetY
    The Y offset of the hitbox relative to the owner's position.
    private final Actor
    owner
    The Actor that owns this collision component.

  • Field Details

    • owner

      private final Actor owner
      The Actor that owns this collision component.

    • hitboxWidth

      private double hitboxWidth
      The width of the collision hitbox.

    • hitboxHeight

      private double hitboxHeight
      The height of the collision hitbox.

    • offsetX

      public double offsetX
      The X offset of the hitbox relative to the owner's position.

    • offsetY

      public double offsetY
      The Y offset of the hitbox relative to the owner's position.

    • hitboxVisualization

      private javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle hitboxVisualization
      A Rectangle visualization of the hitbox for debugging purposes. Visible only if GameSettings.SHOW_HITBOXES is enabled.

    • collisionEnabled

      public boolean collisionEnabled
      Indicates whether collisions are enabled for this component.

  • Constructor Details

    • CollisionComponent

      public CollisionComponent(Actor owner, double hitboxWidth, double hitboxHeight, double offsetX, double offsetY)
      Constructs a new CollisionComponent for the given owner.
      Parameters:
      owner - The Actor that owns this collision component.
      hitboxWidth - The initial width of the hitbox.
      hitboxHeight - The initial height of the hitbox.
      offsetX - The initial X offset of the hitbox relative to the owner's position.
      offsetY - The initial Y offset of the hitbox relative to the owner's position.

  • Method Details

    • setHitboxSize

      public void setHitboxSize(double width, double height)
      Sets the size of the hitbox and resets the offsets to zero.
      Parameters:
      width - The new width of the hitbox.
      height - The new height of the hitbox.

    • updateHitBoxPosition

      public void updateHitBoxPosition()
      Updates the position of the hitbox visualization to match the offsets. Only applies if hitbox visualization is enabled.

    • checkCollision

      public boolean checkCollision(CollisionComponent other)
      Checks for a collision with another CollisionComponent. Beneficial actors (e.g., ActorLevelUp, HeartItem) always collide, while other collisions depend on the collisionEnabled flags.
      Parameters:
      other - The other CollisionComponent to check collision with.
      Returns:
      true if the two components collide; false otherwise.

    • getHitboxX

      public double getHitboxX()
      Gets the X coordinate of the hitbox, including the owner's position and the X offset.
      Specified by:
      getHitboxX in interface Hitbox
      Returns:
      The X coordinate of the hitbox.

    • getHitboxY

      public double getHitboxY()
      Gets the Y coordinate of the hitbox, including the owner's position and the Y offset.

      Returns:

      public double getHitboxWidth()

      public double getHitboxHeight()
      Gets the height of the hitbox.
      Specified by:
      getHitboxHeight in interface Hitbox

      The height of the hitbox.

    • SetActorCollisionEnable

      public void SetActorCollisionEnable(boolean enabled)
      Enables or disables collision detection for this component.
      Parameters:
      enabled - true to enable collisions; false to disable them.
